Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_nc2kmuBZzu1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p>Today, we’re featuring two videos. Why? Why not? First up is <strong>space_scumbag</strong>, who proves that size matters.</p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/4YhpZoPIB8g" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>Next is an oldie, but a goodie that had the KSP team amused for a portion of the afternoon. It’s <strong>rew dew</strong> with <em>financial problems, part 2</em>.</p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/XLdSGp-hbtI?list=UUxI8VSp3ZcKtK6k5VO-MydA" width="420"></iframe></p>

Awww. Personally, I wanted Felsmak's Intense Dragon Adventure to win. Sure, these videos are nice, but Felsmak is a newer YouTuber who needs the views a bit more. Also, I was quite literally howling with laughter when I first watched it.

...but ah well. The videos have been chosen, and I suppose that's the end of it.
We already featured that through social media earlier in the week

We already featured that through social media earlier in the week

Wow, I have to check out your social-media pages more often... My Kerbswagen Pillbug was also featured this week and I had no idea why so many people were watching the video up until now.

Thanks for featuring Felsmak's adventure, by the way. I though it deserved some recognition.
Ahh rew dew, remember him. And space scumbags videos are the best!
